name: Extraction Force
description:
WISHLIST TO ENLIST!


Join the Extraction Force today and prepare for battle. Head behind enemy lines in this vehicle based combat game and destroy everything in your path as you race against the clock to locate and secure stolen nuclear launch codes. Take to the skies and rain down destruction from above with the fast and agile chopper, or bulldoze your way into enemy territory with the rough and tough tank as you fight your way through a dozen progressively more difficult missions.

** THE WORLD IS DEPENDING ON YOU! **

Let nothing stand in your way... Failure is not an option!





  • Heavily armored and the perfect tool for destruction.
  • Slow moving but it packs an explosive punch to make up for it.







  • Armed with rockets to rain destruction from the sky.
  • Fast and agile flight allows the pilot to avoid most incoming enemy attacks.







  • Fast but defenseless, the Jeep is used to retrieve the nuclear launch codes and return them safely to your base.
  • Driving over ammo crates may provide the driver with grenades to toss out the window.
